attributes.action: Sort out the traffic caused by Bicester Village so that residence can get out of the town
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Although Bicester Village is vital to our town with regards to employment, the traffic is getting so serious that soon a life will be lost due to the fact that emergencey services can not get through the traffic. Residence in there own town cannot even get to the local supermarket which stupidly uses the same exit/entrance as Bicester Village.
